# authorizationRequests

**Instance Property**

The authorization requests that the controller manages.

## Declaration

```swift
var authorizationRequests: [ASAuthorizationRequest] { get }
```

## Discussion

Use an authorization provider, like [doc://com.apple.authenticationservices/documentation/AuthenticationServices/ASAuthorizationAppleIDProvider], [doc://com.apple.authenticationservices/documentation/AuthenticationServices/ASAuthorizationPasswordProvider], or [doc://com.apple.authenticationservices/documentation/AuthenticationServices/ASAuthorizationSingleSignOnProvider], to create a request for a particular purpose.

## Inspecting requests

- **ASAuthorizationRequest**: A base class for different kinds of authorization requests.
- **customAuthorizationMethods**: An array of custom authorization methods for the user to choose.
